title: Saw an animated LoL ad while watching a YouTube video
body:
Some guy is bad at LoL because he can't hit skillshots, and then his buddy recommends he play Yi because then you don't have to aim. I wish I was making this up, but I'm not. The bad player asks if this is a problematic design, but the friend says it's okay because there are over 100 champions with unique roles.

The voice actors sounded like they were a pair of interns with no VA experience.

If I had been around other people while watching this ad, and one of them said to me, "hey, don't you play that game?" I'd be like, "um... nope. I don't."

Credit where it's due: this ad may have been incredibly stupid and poorly made, but at least it was coherent and identifiable as a LoL ad, so props for that.
